sources.title: I'm for the Hippopotamus (1979) Safari so good! with Bud Spencer & Terence Hill
sources.description:
Slim schemes and Tom throws fists to sabotage Jack Ormond’s poaching empire, hijacking trucks and unleashing hippos to outwit his hunters. But when Ormond traps Stella, the duo’s brawl erupts into a showdown where loyalties—and punches—fly wilder than a stampede.


I'm for the Hippopotamus (1979) Original title: Io sto con gli ippopotami (1979)

Director: Italo Zingarelli
Writers: Barbara Alberti, Amedeo Pagani, Vincenzo Mannino, Italo Zingarelli

Main cast:
Terence Hill – Slim 
Bud Spencer – Tom 
Joe Bugner – Jack Ormond (the poacher)
May Dlamini – Mama Leone
Dawn Jürgens – Stella (Slim’s love interest)

Genres: Action · Adventure · Comedy
Release date: November 30, 1979 (Italy/US)
Filming location: Set in Africa

metadata.Plot: In Africa, many years ago, Slim and Tom don't like it when a German tyrant, starts selling all of the African wildlife to Canadian Zoo's! Slim and Tom must teach this guy a lesson by beating the hell out of him and his gang, left and right!
metadata.Writer: Barbara Alberti, Amedeo Pagani, Vincenzo Mannino
metadata.Actors: Terence Hill, Bud Spencer, Joe Bugner
